name: Vedant Gupta

certifications.description: Knowledge on Database Management Systems and MySQL

certifications.description: Knowledge of the working of operating systems using hands-on experience with Linux

education.degree: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering with Specialization in Iot and Intelligent Systems

projects.name: Smart Projector
projects.description: An Internet of Things project. It uses Raspberry Pi and sensors like Pi camera and ultrasonic sensor to effectively use electricity.

projects.name: Infection Control System
projects.description: It uses RFID sensor and tags in containing the information of the patients, reducing physical contact between patients and doctors. Could be used in Intensive Care Unit(ICU) in hospitals.

experiences.description: Developed a prototype of the main centralized dashboard. Main Technologies used are Docker, Elastic Search, Kafka, Maven, MySQL, Spring Boot, Version Control System Implements key features like Google OAuth, Multi-Tenancy, Bi-Directional Mapping, Jira Ticket Creation, RBAC, De-Duplication, and Automation Runbook.

full_output.name: Vedant Gupta
achievements_and_awards: Best Prototype Award Nov 2021 Awarded to the team with the best and most unique working prototype in a hackathon with 200 participants. Made a speech to text converter for doctors to help them take notes from the conversation with their patients.

MUJ Hacks 8.0 winner Oct 2023 Won 3rd place on the podium in the hackathon organized by ACM Student Chapter. Implemented a Smart Traffic Management System that works on the principle of IoT and Machine Learning.

degree: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering with Specialization in Iot and Intelligent Systems
